detail_description: Klimataria is a beloved seafood taverna located in the picturesque fishing village of Benitses in Corfu. With a history spanning over 30 years, this family-owned restaurant is known for its rustic charm and warm hospitality. The menu showcases traditional Corfiot dishes such as bourdeto, pastitsada, sofrito, and bianco, prepared with fresh local ingredients.
name: Klimataria

detail_description: Etrusco is a renowned restaurant located in Kato Korakiana, Corfu. The establishment is part of the Botrini family restaurant, known for its inventive menu featuring Italian- and Greek-inspired dishes. Chef Ettore Botrini showcases his impeccable culinary skills with a touch of creativity, particularly in molecular gastronomy. The restaurant offers a variety of appetizers, starters, main courses, and desserts that are sure to tantalize your taste buds.
name: Etrusco

excerpt: Genteel, intimate restaurant with a terrace plating elevated local cuisine, plus a robust wine list.
detail_description: Nestled in the heart of Corfu Town, Venetian Well is a charming and intimate restaurant offering an elevated dining experience. The restaurant's location next to the historic Venetian well adds to its allure, creating a romantic and atmospheric setting. With a menu that combines local flavors with Mediterranean influences, guests can savor gourmet twists on island specialties while enjoying the picturesque surroundings of Kremasti Square.
name: Venetian Well

detail_description: Toula's Seaside is a renowned waterfront restaurant located in Agni Bay, on the northeast coast of the island. This family-run establishment offers a laid-back atmosphere and stunning views of the turquoise sea. Specializing in fresh seafood with Mediterranean flavors, it has been serving delectable dishes since 1981. The menu features super-fresh grilled snapper, shelled prawns, and traditional Corfiot specialties prepared by Mrs. Toula herself.
name: Toula's Seaside

detail_description: Nestled within the old fortress, Corfu Sailing Restaurant has been a popular dining spot since 2004, drawing both locals and tourists. Its prime location offers stunning views of the ocean, creating an exceptional dining experience. The restaurant is known for its Mediterranean and Greek cuisine, with a focus on seafood and fresh fish.
name: Corfu Sailing Restaurant

detail_description: Rex Restaurant, a beloved establishment in Corfu Town since 1932, offers a refined yet laid-back dining experience with a focus on Greek and Corfiot cuisine. Nestled near the iconic Liston promenade, this historic eatery has been catering to both locals and visitors for nearly a century. The classic and elegant interior features soft lighting and ample seating, creating an ideal setting for a peaceful meal with loved ones.
name: Rex Restaurant

excerpt: Unassuming restaurant/bar with views of the marina, serving typical Greek dishes, local wine & beer.
detail_description: Salto is a charming restaurant and bar located in the trendy part of Corfu's old town, Spilia. It offers stunning views of the marina and serves typical Greek dishes along with local wine and beer. The menu features traditional Mediterranean dishes made with pure ingredients from small producers all over Greece, giving them a modern twist. From octopus tempura to herb-encrusted rack of lamb, the cuisine at Salto is both creative and full of character.
name: Salto
The White House Restaurant
address: Kalami Gimari Kalami Bay, Kerkira 490 83, Greece

excerpt: Regional dishes are served in this low-key eatery that features a leafy terrace & sea views.
detail_description: Avli Restaurant in Corfu offers a charming dining experience with its leafy terrace and sea views. The restaurant specializes in mezedes, allowing diners to share small dishes rather than ordering individual main courses. The proprietors, Vasilis and Christos, prioritize local ingredients and showcase inventive combinations such as pork fillet with a sauce made from locally grown kumquats.
name: Avli Restaurant Corfu
address: Alkiviadou Dari 3 Garitsa, Corfu Kerkyra 491 00, Greece

detail_description: Taverna Elizabeth, located in the village of Doukades in northwest Corfu, is a beloved stone-built restaurant offering traditional Corfiot-style slow food. The verdant, shaded courtyard upstairs provides a charming dining setting with views over the village, while indoors, vintage ouzo and Metaxa bottles adorn the decor. Run by Elizabeth's granddaughter, this old-school spot serves emblematic dishes such as pastitsada, a rich tomato-based casserole traditionally reserved for Sunday family lunch.
name: Taverna Elizabeth

detail_description: En Plo is a charming restaurant located in the Faliraki area just outside Corfu old town, offering a stunning waterfront dining experience. Situated right on the quay, diners can enjoy clear blue waters and even take a swim from their table. The menu features an array of options including snacks, pizzas, mezedes, salads, and pastas.
name: En Plo
address: Πυλη Αγιου Νικολαου ΦΑΛΗΡΑΚΙ ΚΕΡΚΥΡΑ, Kerkira 491 00, Greece

detail_description: Pomo D'Oro Corfu is a charming restaurant located in historic Skaramanga square, run by head chef Aristotelis Megoulas. Despite not having formal culinary training, his passion for cooking led him to learn from restaurant kitchens in Bologna. His pan-Mediterranean fusion cuisine reflects his Greek and French heritage, as well as his time spent in Italy.
name: Pomo D'Oro Corfu

detail_description: Spianada is a must-visit destination in Greece, especially during Easter. It offers stunning ocean views and an opportunity to dine at the Corfu Sailing Club Restaurant or En Plo, both of which provide amazing food with generous portions at reasonable prices. Located just outside of Old Towne, it's easily accessible from the cruise port without the large crowds. Don't miss out on trying the delicious lamb kebab and sweet potato fries while enjoying the beautiful surroundings.
name: Spianada

detail_description: Aegli is a long-established and casually elegant restaurant located on the Liston arcade in Corfu town. It offers both local and international dishes, including steamed mussels, salads, Greek classics like spicy bourdetto and braised lamb shanks in red wine. The restaurant provides a great dining experience with attentive service and delicious food.
name: Aegli
address: Kapodistriou, Liston - Eleftherias Ave 23, Kerkira 491 00, Greece

excerpt: Standard restaurant with outdoor seating whipping up homestyle gyros, salads, seafood & meat dishes.
detail_description: Taverna Ninos is a traditional restaurant located in the city center of Corfu, offering outdoor seating and serving up homestyle gyros, salads, seafood, and meat dishes. The restaurant prides itself on providing authentic Corfiot flavors and traditional recipes made with fresh ingredients at affordable prices. It is known for its specialties such as sofrito and pastitsada. Despite being tucked away, it has a lively atmosphere and exudes a traditional old-school vibe.
name: Ninos

detail_description: Rouvas Tavern is a popular lunch spot located in the heart of Corfu's commercial district, near San Rocco Square. It attracts locals, including civil servants and lawyers, who appreciate the chef's flavorful traditional dishes such as fried fish with garlic sauce, pastitsio, and rabbit stifado. The restaurant offers an expanded menu similar to some places in Athens but provides a genuine home-cooked food experience without touristy views.
name: Rouvas Tavern

detail_description: Trilogia Restaurant is situated in the stunning location of Kassiopi, Corfu, offering a sophisticated dining experience. The restaurant's menu predominantly features Greek cuisine and promises a fine dining experience. It is considered one of the top restaurants in Kassiopi, providing an ideal setting for visitors to savor delicious Greek dishes. With its prime location and focus on quality dining, Trilogia Restaurant stands out as a must-visit culinary destination in this beautiful area of Corfu.
name: Trilogia Restaurant

detail_description: Flavor is a charming restaurant located just a short walk from the town, run by a talented mother-daughter team. The cozy atmosphere is enhanced by beautiful Italian music playing softly in the background, creating the perfect setting for intimate conversations. The attentive and sweet staff add to the overall experience. The menu offers generous portions of delicious food at reasonable prices, with thoughtful pairings of veggies that make each dish both healthy and tasty.
name: Flavor

detail_description: Nestled within the stunning Liston arcade, which boasts a striking late 19th-century architecture, the Liston Gastrotheque is an elegant all-day café restaurant that perfectly captures the essence of Corfu Town. With its honey-beige interiors and charming framed artwork, it offers a cozy indoor atmosphere during cooler months. When the weather permits, guests can enjoy their meals under the beautiful arches reminiscent of rue de Rivoli, soaking in the vibrant ambiance.
name: Liston Gastrotheque
